name: FlashCardApp
description: Desktop flash card application made with C# and WPF. App uses AnkiConnectApi to connect with Anki.

name: PomodoroApp
description: Simple pomodoro application made with C# and AvaloniaUI.

name: ReactTodoApp
description: Simple todo application made with React. Todo data is loaded from external api hosted on Express Api Server. App state is managed with Redux.
